Title: Spirits of the Water
Description:
Our war against the hozen rages without end, and the future of our tribe is uncertain.

This is why our waterspeaker has decided to seek wisdom from the waters.

Elder Lusshan is waiting. Please deliver the instruments so that they may begin.
ObjectivesText: Speak to Elder Lusshan and witness the waterspeaking ceremony.
RewardText:
I saw the vision, $n. What do you think it means?

I think it is clear that you play some part in it.
